description: Creates a standby WorkSpace in a secondary Region.

parameters.name: PrimaryRegion
parameters.description: The Region of the primary WorkSpace.

parameters.name: StandbyWorkspaces
parameters.description: Information about the standby WorkSpace to be created. (dict) --- Describes a standby WorkSpace. The identifier of the standby WorkSpace. VolumeEncryptionKey (string) --- The volume encryption key of the standby WorkSpace. The identifier of the directory for the standby WorkSpace. Tags (list) --- The tags associated with the standby WorkSpace. (dict) --- Describes a tag. The key of the tag. Value (string) --- The value of the tag. DataReplication (string) --- Indicates whether data replication is enabled, and if enabled, the type of data replication.

nested_params.name: PrimaryWorkspaceId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the standby WorkSpace.

nested_params.name: VolumeEncryptionKey
nested_params.description: The volume encryption key of the standby WorkSpace.

nested_params.name: DirectoryId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the directory for the standby WorkSpace.

nested_params.name: Tags
nested_params.description: The tags associated with the standby WorkSpace.

nested_params.name: DataReplication
nested_params.description: Indicates whether data replication is enabled, and if enabled, the type of data replication.

nested_items.name: FailedStandbyRequests
nested_items.description: Information about the standby WorkSpace that could not be created.

nested_items.name: StandbyWorkspaceRequest
nested_items.description: Information about the standby WorkSpace that could not be created.

nested_items.name: PrimaryWorkspaceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the standby WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: VolumeEncryptionKey
nested_items.description: The volume encryption key of the standby WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: DirectoryId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the directory for the standby WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags associated with the standby WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: DataReplication
nested_items.description: Indicates whether data replication is enabled, and if enabled, the type of data replication.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code that is returned if the standby WorkSpace could not be created.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The text of the error message that is returned if the standby WorkSpace could not be created.

nested_items.name: PendingStandbyRequests
nested_items.description: Information about the standby WorkSpace that was created.

nested_items.name: UserName
nested_items.description: Describes the standby WorkSpace that was created.

nested_items.name: DirectoryId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the directory for the standby WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The operational state of the standby WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: WorkspaceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the standby WorkSpace.
